description:
*** Soon to be DEPRECATED ***


As part of an ongoing conversion, the data in this table will be transitioned to a different data structure.


Use V_PAT_DIALYSIS_HISTORY to accurately report on all historic and new dialysis data.


Patient's dialysis history.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter.  This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: ID of the deployment owner for this contact.

columns.name: DIALYSIS_EAF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the facility profile that is associated with the dialysis center.

columns.name: DIALYSIS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of dialysis, such as continuous veno-venous hemofiltration or peritoneal dialysis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Hemo


Peritoneal


Continuous Arteriovenous Hemofiltration


Continuous Veno-Venous Hemofiltration


Acute-Hemo


Acute-Peritoneal


Continuous Veno-Venous Hemodialysis


Continuous Arteriovenous Hemodialysis


Maintenance (Type Unknown)


In-center Hemodialysis


Home Hemodialysis


Continuous Ambulatory Peritoneal Dialysis


Continuous Cycling Peritoneal Dialysis
